nodes.text: The Shadow Night Festival was a periodic Ewok party in Bright Tree Village. It was a costumed event in which new Ewok couples danced and got to know one another.
Only adult or teen Ewoks could enjoy the Shadow Night Festival. Generally, male Ewoks would invite their sweethearts.

The episode "The Raich" shows the first Shadow Night Festival of the young Ewoks Wicket, Kneesaa, Teebo, and Latara. Latara accepted Teebo's invitation, after uselessly waiting for other invitations. Wicket and Kneesaa, together since their childhood, went together to the festival. This festival was Asha's first one as well (after her return to the village). She accepted Tak's invitation.
